pr_title: Move native Thread.setNameImpl method after Thread initialize()

timeline.message:
Move native Thread.setNameImpl method after Thread initialize()

To ensure proper Thread/ClassLoader initialization before binding the
native method java.lang.Thread.setNameImpl(threadRef, threadName), move
it after initialize(booting, threadGroup, null, null, true) within the
Thread constructor;
Limit the change to JDK15+.


Signed-off-by: Jason Feng <fengj@ca.ibm.com>

Move native Thread.setNameImpl method after Thread initialize()

To ensure proper Thread/ClassLoader initialization before binding the
native method java.lang.Thread.setNameImpl(threadRef, threadName), move
it after initialize(booting, threadGroup, null, null, true) within the
Thread constructor;
Limit the change to JDK15+ booting stage.


Signed-off-by: Jason Feng <fengj@ca.ibm.com>

timeline.bodyText: Sorry, one more thing. Please add a comment to explain why the Java 15 code is different.
timeline.author: pshipton

replies.bodyText: Added a comment to explain the rational of this change.
